basic.description: This course covers aggregate properties and tests, tests of asphalt and asphalt concrete mixes, fundamental engineering characteristics of hot-mix asphalt concrete, mix design methods for asphalt concrete, as well as Superpave-mix design methodology and production and placement of hot-mix asphalt.
basic.subject: TTE
basic.title: Hot Mix Asphalt Mixture Design

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: CCE 3101. Pre- or Corequisite: CGN 3508L.
